name: Golden Ale
description: A crisp and light beer with hints of citrus and a smooth finish, perfect for warm weather.

name: Lager Delight
description: A rich, full-bodied lager with malty sweetness balanced by a hint of bitterness.

name: Bitter Brew
description: A hoppy beer with a strong bitterness and earthy undertones, refreshing yet bold.

name: Amber Waves
description: A smooth amber ale with caramel notes and a mild, toasted flavor that lingers.

name: Pale Ale Punch
description: A balanced pale ale with floral hops and crisp malt flavors, leaving a refreshing finish.

name: Hazy IPA
description: A hazy IPA with juicy citrus notes, a fruity aroma, and a smooth mouthfeel that is easy to enjoy.

name: Dark Stout
description: A rich and creamy stout with deep chocolate and coffee flavors that are warming and bold.

name: Pilsner Breeze
description: A clean and crisp pilsner with a light malt profile and subtle bitterness that’s perfect for refreshing.

name: Wheat Bliss
description: A wheat beer with fruity esters and a smooth, slightly cloudy appearance that makes it a refreshing choice.

name: Citrus Zing
description: A bright and citrusy beer with an aroma of orange and grapefruit, offering a refreshing experience.

name: Belgian Dubbel
description: A rich Belgian ale with dark fruit flavors, caramel sweetness, and a malty finish.

name: Session IPA
description: A session IPA with moderate bitterness and tropical fruit notes, easy to drink but flavorful.

name: Barrel Aged Porter
description: A smooth and robust porter aged in whiskey barrels, offering notes of oak, vanilla, and chocolate.

name: Lemon Lager
description: A refreshing lager with a zesty lemon finish, perfect for hot summer days.

name: Spicy Red Ale
description: A spicy red ale with a blend of hops and malts that offer a bold, tangy kick with every sip.

name: Cranberry Wheat
description: A crisp and fruity wheat beer with a hint of cranberry that adds a tart, refreshing taste.

name: Blonde Lager
description: A light and smooth lager with subtle malt sweetness and a refreshing crisp finish.

name: Imperial Stout
description: A dark and rich stout with flavors of coffee, chocolate, and a warming alcohol finish.

name: Porter Blend
description: A complex porter with smoky notes, hints of coffee, and a rich malty sweetness that lasts.

name: India Pale Ale
description: A bold IPA with tropical fruit flavors and a smooth bitterness that lingers on the palate.

name: Pale Wheat
description: A pale wheat beer with refreshing floral notes and a light, crisp finish.

name: Fruity IPA
description: A fruity IPA with strong tropical flavors and a juicy mouthfeel, refreshing with every sip.

name: Brown Ale
description: A smooth brown ale with nutty malt flavors, balanced by a touch of caramel and toasted notes.

name: Amber Lager
description: A smooth amber lager with a balanced malt profile and a mild bitterness that’s easy to enjoy.
